dc:title: A Friend of The Family - Mr. O'Connell is Dead
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A difficult eulogy for Maurice O'Connell who lived at the Easton farm for over 10 years. Notes his helpful side as a worker and his cantankerous nature that tried the patience of nearly everyone in the community. Reflects on the interplay of supernatural love and human freedom.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 630 1952-03-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
